attributes.action: increase tax on high in saturated fat, high in sugar and high in salt, junk foods. Meanwhile lowering the price or tax on fruits and vegetables to make them more affordable and appealing to the working class family
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The cost of food in this country is completely back to front. Healthier foods should be in the lower price bracket. Junk food should be more expensive.

There is evidence to suggest that the government's goal to improve the diet and general health of children (and adults alike) is proving unsuccessful, despite billions of pounds being put into this scheme.

By making the junk foods less attractive by increaseing the price, more people will start buying healthy foods.

This will save the tax-payer billions in the long-term, as diet-related illnesses decrease and the general pulic become more healthy.
 
Meanwhile, the extra revenue from the junk foods can be used by the government to educate families on healthy eating.
